description: In this class, students will learn the basic technique of folding Origami paper and explore how the concepts of Origami can be applied in the creation of personal objects and in creative practice. Origami has enormous possibilities in many fields from fashion to aerospace. Class assignments expand the boundaries of Origami practice and provide students with an understanding of this important aspect of Japanese visual culture.
name: Top: Origami & its Art Application
notes: Course topic: Origami and its application to Art
The materials fee for ART 240 will be $50.
title: Topics in the Fine Arts
